doc.after: After the German conquest on 29 June 1941 the naval base at Liep ja Latvia came under the command of the Kriegsmarine On 1 July 1941 town commandant Korvettenkapit n Stein ordered that ten hostages be shot for every act of sabotage and further put civilians in the zone of targeting by declaring that Red Army soldiers were hiding among them in civilian attire On 5 July 1941 Korvettenkapit n Br ckner who had taken over for Stein issued a set of anti Jewish regulations 10 in the local newspaper Kurzemes V rds 9 Summarized these were as follows 11
